passives.name: Buildup
passives.effects: After 90 seconds, turrets gain ''Overgrowth''. Champions can attack a turret with ''Overgrowth'' to consume the effect and deal {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} based on how long the ''Overgrowth'' has built up, capped at 300 seconds of growth time.

effects_structured.raw: After 90 seconds, turrets gain ''Overgrowth''. Champions can attack a turret with ''Overgrowth'' to consume the effect and deal {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} based on how long the ''Overgrowth'' has built up, capped at 300 seconds of growth time.
